name: Mark
text: Welcome! You’ve made it farther than anyone else. Impressive.

name: You
text: Thanks, I guess? Now, how about showing me the way out?

name: Mark
text: Not so fast. There’s a problem that needs solving first. Take care of it, and I’ll point you in the right direction.

name: Mark
text: It’s those annoying slimes again. Get rid of them, but be careful—they’re toxic even after death.

name: You
text: Got it. Leave it to me.
